title: WTB: Large group of raw T206s vg-ex or better
author: Archive

posts.post_title: WTB: Large group of raw T206s vg-ex or better
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott Levy
Trying to build a raw set and am looking for a grouping of a least 100 vg-ex or ex or ex/mt T206s.  

Not interested in beaters, back damage or trimmed cards -- just quality raw cards.

Regards,
Scott
